reviewText: Features 12 scenes with gals, their majors are mentioned , some talk. 1- Pose, top and back, 2-2 gals bounce on an inflateable pool toy, 3-bare walk in the hall that appears to be from Naked Girls In My Office No. 1, 4-covergirl in weight room, 5-art major on a turn-table display, 6-dance, navel pierced and tat, 7 pose for photos, pierced navel and shaved, 9-with ballons, 10-pop ballons. At the end each model is reviewed two times.

First off, this DVD is NOT pornographic (for those who are wandering). The DVD consists of scenes of young women, who pose naked, in a photography studio. While it's great to stare at a nude woman and have the camera pan up and down her body, for me, it felt like the camera shied away from the girls' genitalia.

The camera gives good shots of the girls' breasts and, while she turns around, the camera offers good shots of their butt. However, the camera doesn't provide good shots of the genitalia (those shots are not as lingering as the shots of the breasts or the butt).

I took a half-star, because of the "shy" camera. I took another half-star away, because, all that the girls do, is pose (with minimum movement). (When I want to see a naked woman, I prefer that she is moving.)

So, would I recommend this DVD to others ... Yes, but only to those who are interested in "artistic nudity".
this is a great video for anyone that likes pretty petite college girls bare all.
